mapper.select: SELECT id, parent_id parentId, org_code orgCode, name, sort, area_id areaId, code, type, grade, address, zip_code zipCode, master, phone, fax, email, state, remarks FROM tb_unit where parent_id = #{parentId}

SELECT t.id, t.parent_id parentId, t.org_code orgCode, t.name, t.sort, t.area_id areaId, t.code, t.type, t.grade, t.address, t.zip_code zipCode, t.master, t.phone, t.fax, t.email, t.state, t.remarks FROM tb_unit t where EXISTS (select 1 from tb_unit t1 where t1.parent_id = 0 and t1.id = t.parent_id) or t.parent_id = 0
select LPAD(x.orgCode + 1, length(x.orgCode), '0') from (select max(org_code) orgCode from tb_unit where parent_id = #{parentId}) x

select tu.*, IF(tgu.group_id is null,0,1) checked, (select count(1) from tb_unit where parent_id = tu.id) leafCount from tb_unit tu left join (select group_id, unit_id from tb_group_unit where group_id = #{groupId}) tgu on tu.id = tgu.unit_id
select unit_id from tb_group_unit where group_id = #{groupId}
